samples.summary: Bookworm is an iOS app built in CSCI 379: Human-Computer Interaction. For any college student, searching for material is blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah.

samples.title: ParkMe
samples.summary: ParkMe is an iOS app built in CSCI 379: Human-Computer Interaction. The ParkMe design prototype is built to crowdsource GPS data from cars to estimate whether parking is available in different lots over the course of the day.

samples.title: Bison Ordering System (BOS)
samples.summary: BOS is an iPad app built in CSCI 379: Human-Computer Interaction. The BOS design prototype is meant to replace, ease, and expedite the paper ordering system that currently exists at the Bison Grill
